Here you will find instructions in how to install other DaVinci packages containing modules to use in your application

At the moment there are 5 additional packages developed within the DaVinci project:

  - dv.loader
  - dv.filter
  - dv.general

## How to install

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# TODO
repos <- options("repos")

install.packages(c("dv.loader", "dv.manager", "dv.filter"),
  repos = c(repos, repos_dvcd)
)
```
